paper_abstract: The aim of this note is to mend a flaw in the proof of Theorem 2 in our paper [M. Ma, G. Liu, J.-M. Xu, The super connectivity of augmented cubes, Information Processing Letters 106 (2008) 59-63]. (c) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on "The super connectivity of augmented cubes"
